name: Tesla MusicBot
description: Telegram VoiceChat Bot, Written In Python Using Pytgcalls & Pyrogram.

SESSION.description: A pyrogram session, Get it from here https://replit.com/@madboy482/Pyrogram-Session or get it by running python3 sessiongen.py locally.

PREFIX.description: Userbot Prefix to run the commands. Add your own or keep as default (!)

SUDOS.description: User ID of users who can use commands, split by space.
